summary: When a one-night stand results in pregnancy, Scott has to embark on a personal quest to convince Allison to give him a second chance.
cast: Des Brady|Galit Hershkovitz|Luke Goss|Surinder Duhra|Matt Eggleton|Zoe Teverson|Ray Brady|Joseph Rye|Michael Chomiak|Barry Lee-Thomas|Aiden Brady|Deba Brady|Lance Bryce-Borthwick|Duncan Atkins|Thomas Lee-Smith|Athen Brady|Andre Lillis|Caroline Lena Olsson
title: Love Life
